CREATOR: Elena Kagan ( CN=Elena Kagan/OU=OPD/O=EOP      [ OPD ]   )

CREATION DATE/TIME: 8-FEB-1997 15:24:49.00

SUBJECT:   attached memo

TO: Cathy R. Mays   ( CN=Cathy R. Mays/OU=OPD/O=EOP @ EOP     [ OPD ] )
READ:UNKNOWN

TEXT:
Could you send the attached memo to all DPC members, inviting them to our
meeting on Friday morning?  Bruce has approved it.  Thanks.

==================== ATTACHMENT   1 ====================
ATT CREATION TIME/DATE:   0 00:00:00.00

                                               February 7, 1997

     MEMORANDUM FOR THE DOMESTIC POLICY COUNCIL

     FROM:                     BRUCE REED

     SUBJECT:                  FEBRUARY MEETING

             There will be a meeting of the Domestic Policy Council on Friday, February 13 from
      10:30 to 11 :30 a.m. in the Roosevelt Room.

                As you recall, at the last cabinet meeting, the Chief of Staff asked each Secretary to
       review second-term prioritie~ in light of the President's State of the Union address. He also has
     . asked the various Policy Councils to meet with their member agencies in order to discuss these
       priorities. I hope to use this discussion to seek your help on a number of concrete projects,
       including promoting the President's 10-point education plan, creating work opportunities for
       welfare recipients, and providing assistance to the D.C. government. I also will give you an
       update and seek further advice on the 0-3 conference we talked about at our last meeting.

            Please have your staff provide any necessary clearance information to Cathy Mays (456-
     6515). If you have any questions about the meeting, please contact me (456-6515) or my Deputy,
     Elena Kagan (456-5584).




                                                               Automated Records Management System
                                                               Hex-Dump Conversion
